name: Highway Speed Car Racing
description:
Burn up the street with the fastest and most exhilarating 3D racing action. Highway Speed Car Racing combines stunning, high fidelity graphics with addictive gameplay that will have you swerving through oncoming traffic, collecting power-ups, and knocking other racers off the road. With astonishing physics, eye-popping tracks, and awesome cars, Highway Speed Car Racing creates a new type of racing experience

Features
- Smoothest gameplay to thrill the race.
- Fantastic music to vibrate your mind.
- Loads of luxury cars to unlock.
- Tons of car racers.
- Amazing 3D road graphics.
- Loads of environment.
- Adventurous drive among city traffic.
- Realistic driving experience.
